tweets.text: The next stage in repairing two groynes (13 & 14) at Teignmouth is underway. Access to the lighthouse, the prom and nearby steps to the beach will be restricted until 1 June whilst @EnvAgency contractors undertake the work at low tides. Temporary safety fencing will be in place. https://t.co/DSKaSr6OTc

@WasteCrimeWatch @SianieRoo @EnvAgency But the EA have said it‚Äôs ok as his conviction is spent , well that‚Äôs ok then if @EnvAgency say it‚Äôs fine it must be ! I seem to remember a phrase about leopards and spots ‚Ä¶.

urls.title: Sign the Petition
urls.description: Stop diesel pollution in Lower Test River

tweets.text:
Recently, Emma has noticed traces of diesel in the River test after it has rained. Emma is calling on the @EnvAgency and @SouthernWater to take action to stop the diesel pollution in the river. 

You can support Emma and sign her petition here: https://t.co/nATRjXOPLM
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL 4610ppm. Had to triple check I'd read that correctly.  wow

Landfill update: it‚Äôs emerged that in May 2020, hydrogen sulphide levels on site were measured at 4610ppm! 20ppm can cause eye irritation; 1000ppm can cause death.

@EnvAgencyMids you let this happen. Why is the site still taking waste today? https://t.co/G4L1hSmuNb

For anyone not following the Terry Avenue saga, @CityofYork are letting @EnvAgencyYNE run a site and its access that is an accident waiting to happen.

The conflict between pedestrians and cyclists makes it deeply unsafe, as pointed out repeatedly by @YorkCycle. https://t.co/IrwfYDTPiz

tweets.text:
Recently, Emma has noticed traces of diesel in the River test after it has rained. Emma is calling on the @EnvAgency and @SouthernWater to take action to stop the diesel pollution in the river. 

You can support Emma and sign her petition here: https://t.co/nATRjXOPLM

Today on @inkcapjournal, I've published my investigation into rewilding by local authorities across England.

I was interested in how councils defined rewilding, what they were doing, and what they were spending.

And I found some really fascinating stuff.
https://t.co/Q84kgM8nva

‚ö†Ô∏èBIG NEWS!

Thanks to the to 160,000+ who signed our #StateofNature petition, England will be the 1st country in the world to have a legal deadline to halt nature's decline! ‚úä

A massive thanks to everyone for helping get this win for all wildlifeüéâ

https://t.co/QSV9eeubU8

Bless him üôè 
The @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland & #georgeuseless clearly don‚Äôt care. But our community does& we will continue to fight for Matthew #stopthestink @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe https://t.co/QXWsYd2VHs

üìä HEALTH AND IMPACT SURVEY REPORT üìä

I have published this today.

64% of respondents report a significant or severe impact on their mental health. This rose to 73% amongst those living closest to the site.

The full report can be downloaded at https://t.co/AdCwqMGSlE https://t.co/CHPVzKlq7f

@DefraGovUK Meanwhile the people of N-u-L are still being poisoned on a daily basis by landfill gases and our environment decimated. You would do well to get @EnvAgency to sort their act out before preaching to us.

@StinkStopthe #HumanRights #ClimateEmergency #ClimateAction

@poppers82 @HelenVi00175623 @kathari90167150 @MissyDoom @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency Then let‚Äôs make a massive effort to get this nationwide and shame them into doing something

Levels at 4610ppm when 1000ppm can kill you and no one who should have did anything. Speaks for itself as to what @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @RedIndustries2 think of us ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨

So now folk around newcastle need to report to the @EnvAgencyMids , @NewsNBC and @StaffordshireCC ? 

It‚Äôs a joke and a stalling tactic until summer, now the election is over. 

They have the data. 

No more stalling. No more reporting.

Closure and capping now.

@StinkStopthe
